snippet: Betty Buckley’s new show at Feinstein’s at Loews Regency is rich in musical theater lore and spicy autobiographical tidbits.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews The Other Woman: The Vixens of Broadway, Betty Buckley's new cabaret show at Feinstein's at Loews Regency.
lead_paragraph: Betty Buckley’s new show at Feinstein’s at Loews Regency is rich in musical theater lore and spicy autobiographical tidbits.

headline.seo: Betty Buckley in ‘The Other Woman,’ at Feinstein’s
headline.main: This Time It’s the Women Giving the Business
headline.print_headline: This Time It’s the Women Giving the Business
